T02TD2000E:204a-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra wa ba lim bi dhi:/
T02TD2000E:204a-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gtor ma'i cho ga / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2000E:204a-4: gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2000E:204a-6: bar chad zhi phyir gtor ma ni //
T02TD2000E:204a-7: 'bad de yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-8: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi //
T02TD2000E:204a-9: gtor ma byed par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2000E:204a-10: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2000E:204a-11: rdzas kyi gtor ma bsham par bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-12: sgrub po lha phyogs kha bltas la //
T02TD2000E:204a-13: skad cig tsam gyis 'jigs par bskyed //
T02TD2000E:204a-14: mdun du yam dang ram las ni //
T02TD2000E:204a-15: rlung dang me yi dbyibs can bskyed //
T02TD2000E:204a-16: de yi steng du sgyed gsum bsam //
T02TD2000E:204a-17: de steng aa las thod pa'i snod //
T02TD2000E:204a-18: nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD2000E:204a-19: skad cig tsam gyis bsam par bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-20: steng du aom a'a: h'um yig rnams //
T02TD2000E:204a-21: go rims ji bzhin bsam par bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-22: 'od spros sku sogs rim bkug la ;
T02TD2000E:204a-23: / rim pa bzhin du bstim pa dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-24: de nyid gsum ni brjod pa yis //
T02TD2000E:204a-25: gtor ma dag par bsgom par bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-26: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um //
T02TD2000E:204a-28: lha rnams spyan drangs mdun du bsam //
T02TD2000E:204a-29: h'um brjod lce ni byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2000E:204a-30: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02TD2000E:204a-31: badzra bhee ra wa aa dhi pa ti /
T02TD2000E:204a-33: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2000E:204a-34: zhes pas dbul ba'i sngags brjod bya //
T02TD2000E:204a-35: de rnams gsol bar bsams nas ni //
T02TD2000E:204a-36: las kyi bye brag phrin las bcol //
T02TD2000E:204a-37: ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang //
T02TD2000E:204a-38: khyad par drag po bcol ba ni //
T02TD2000E:204a-39: bla ma smod par byed pa dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-40: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-41: bstan pa la gnod byed pa dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-42: sems can kun la gnod byed dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-43: sngags rgyud la gnod byed pa'i mi //
T02TD2000E:204a-44: 'di rnams khyed kyis gsad du gsol //
T02TD2000E:204a-45: zhes pas phrin las bcol lo //
T02TD2000E:204a-46: de nas gnang ba byin par bsam //
T02TD2000E:204a-47: de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod //
T02TD2000E:204a-48: aom a'a: h'um mu: sa mgron rnams ni ;
T02TD2000E:204a-49: / rang bzhin gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2000E:204a-50: de ltar byas pa'i phan yon ni //
T02TD2000E:204a-51: bar du gcod pa zhi ba dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-52: mi mthun phyogs rnams 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2000E:204a-53: dngos grub dam pa thob par gyur //
T02TD2000E:204a-54: gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba na //
T02TD2000E:204a-55: nad dang dgra la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2000E:204a-56: tshar gcod rjes gzung thams cad ni //
T02TD2000E:204b-1: rdo rje 'jigs byed gtor ma yi //
T02TD2000E:204b-2: cho ga phun sum tshogs pa brtsams //
T02TD2000E:204b-3: gang yod bsod nams de yis ni //
T02TD2000E:204b-4: sems can ma lus dgra las rgyal bar shog / slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//
